clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: Any changes are effective when we post the revised Privacy Policy on the Platform.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesnâ€™t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: The service only has links to its policies on a home page that is no longer available when you sign in. When you sign up for the service, there is no check box to agree, and the only policy linked is the Terms of Use not the Privacy Policy.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: device type, operating system and Internet browser type,

clauses.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or needs to transfer personal data after a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale of the services, the data will still be processed in a manner that honours the promises made in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text: Any other entity which buys us or part of our business will have the right to continue to use your Personal Data, but only in the manner set out in this Privacy Policy

case.text: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text:
terminate your access to the Services with notice to you if:

  • You are in breach of these Terms

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not share, rent or sell Member Personal Data for interest-based advertising.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.clause_text: applicable data privacy laws such as GDPR

clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

clauses.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.
clauses.clause_text: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of any third-party website operator that you may link to from our website.

clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

including:

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: no industry standard for recognizing Do Not Track browser signals, so we do not respond to them

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
